TextView.android:text: Title:Truthfulness of Hazrat Abdul Quader Jilani

In his boyhood Hazrat Abdul Quadir Zilani(R) was going to Baghdad for education.On the eve of his departure from home , his mother said to hime,'My son,never tell a lie and don't get frightened in danger'.Baghdad was far away from his home.He bagan his journey in the compay of a band of merchants.The way was infested with robbers and after five days a gang of robbers fell upon the travellers.The robbers thought that there was nothing to that small boy.The leader of the gang ordered the robbers to release him.Then the boy Abdul Quader remembered his mother's advice and said,'I have forty gold coins sewed in my shirt.'The leader became surprised .The leader said,'You could save your money without revealing the truth.' The boy said,'Mother has advised me never to tell a lie even in danger.'The robbers felt ashamed of their deeds and gave up robbery.
